channel.title: Posts on Página profissional
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Página profissional

item.title: Credit Risk Modeling in R (DataCamp, 4h)
item.description:
(Link do certificado para download)

ID da licença: ff790720ef23fc9bdfbe4634a0ea11f3ab61aa7a

This hands-on-course with real-life credit data will teach you how to model credit risk by using logistic regression and decision trees in R.

Modeling credit risk for both personal and company loans is of major importance for banks. The probability that a debtor will default is a key component in getting to a measure for credit risk. While other models will be introduced in this course as well, you will learn about two model types that are often used in the credit scoring context; logistic regression and decision trees. You will learn how to use them in this particular context, and how these models are evaluated by banks.

item.title: Data Scientist with R (DataCamp, 95h)
item.description:
(Link do certificado para download)

ID da licença: b7606707581d354af34fb3ebe155054814de4354

Este módulo é composto por um total de 23 cursos, totalizando uma carga horária de 95 horas.

Os cursos foram concluídas em uma ordem lógica, em conformidade com a lista abaixo:

  • Introduction to R (4h)
  • Intermediate R (6h)
  • Intermediate R - Practice (4h)
  • Importing Data in R - Part 1 (3h)
  • Importing Data in R - Part 2 (3h)
  • Cleaning Data in R (4h)
  • Importing & Cleaning Data in R: Case Studies (4h)
  • Writing Functions in R (4h)
  • Data Manipulation in R with dplyr (4h)
  • Joining Data in R with dplyr (4h)
  • Data Visualization in R (4h)
  • Data Visualization with ggplot2 - Part 1 (5h)
  • Data Visualization with ggplot2 - Part 1 (5h)
  • Data Visualization with ggplot2 - Part 1 (6h)
  • Introduction to Data (4h)
  • Exploratory Data Analysis (4h)
  • Exploratory Data Analysis in R: Case Study (4h)
  • Correlation and Regression (4h)
  • Foundations of Inference (4h)
  • Machine Learning Toolbox (4h)
  • Unsupervised Learning in R (4h)
  • Text Mining: Bag of Words (4h)
  • Reporting with R Markdown (3h)

item.title: Intro to SQL for Data Science (DataCamp, 4h)
item.description:
(Link do certificado para download)

ID da licença: cc34be2d16d9d1940c907fbc021f7061bfb875e4

The role of a data scientist is to turn raw data into actionable insights. Much of the world’s raw data—from electronic medical records to customer transaction histories—lives in organized collections of tables called relational databases. Therefore, to be an effective data scientist, you must know how to wrangle and extract data from these databases using a language called SQL (pronounced ess-que-ell, or sequel). This course teaches you everything you need to know to begin working with databases today!

item.title: Writing Efficient R Code (DataCamp, 4h)
item.description:
(Link do certificado para download)

ID da licença: 935f7ab3c5852e3013d1d75ddba9bbaec56d0dae

The beauty of R is that it is built for performing data analysis. The downside is that sometimes R can be slow, thereby obstructing our analysis. For this reason, it is essential to become familiar with the main techniques for speeding up your analysis, so you can reduce computational time and get insights as quickly as possible.
